site_title: Sri Sri Sri Bhunela Sametha Sri Venkateshwara Swamy Devasthanam
footer_name: Sri Sri Sri Bhunela Sametha Sri Venkateshwara Swamy Devasthanam
welcome: Welcome to Sri Sri Sri Bhunela Sametha Sri Venkateshwara Swamy Devasthanam, Devalthirumalpur Village
about_short: A sacred Vaishnava temple preserving ancient traditions, rituals, and divine heritage.
about_full: Sri Sri Sri Bhunela Sametha Sri Venkateshwara Swamy Devasthanam is a revered spiritual center located in Devalthirumalpur Village, Peddakothapally Mandal, Nagarkurnool District, Telangana. The temple follows traditional Vaishnava customs with daily poojas, special sevas, annual Brahmotsavams, and devotional festivals. For centuries, this holy shrine has been a source of spiritual guidance, faith, and devotion for countless devotees.
goshala_desc: The temple Goshala is dedicated to protecting sacred cows and promoting traditional cow-based dharmic practices. It plays a vital role in preserving Sanatana Dharma and supporting spiritual traditions.
library_desc: The temple maintains a spiritual library preserving Indiaâ€™s sacred and mythological heritage. Available books include Ramayana, Mahabharata, Bhagavad Gita, Srimad Bhagavatam, Vishnu Purana, Upanishads, and biographies of great saints. Languages available: Telugu, Sanskrit, and English. Open during temple hours for all devotees.
contact_addr: Sri Sri Sri Bhunela Sametha Sri Venkateshwara Swamy Devasthanam, Devalthirumalpur Village, Peddakothapally Mandal, Nagarkurnool District, Telangana â€“ India. Nearest Railway Station: Jadcherla. Nearest Airport: Hyderabad (RGIA).
places_desc: Important pilgrimage and tourist places near the Devasthanam
umamaheshwaram_desc: An important Shaivite pilgrimage surrounded by natural beauty.
srisailam_desc: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva.
nagarjuna_desc: A famous river dam and tourist destination known for Buddhist heritage and scenic beauty.
somasila_desc: A historic dam built on the Penna River, offering a calm and spiritual atmosphere.
dindi_desc: A beautiful reservoir surrounded by forests and hills, ideal for nature lovers.
temples_desc: Important temples and spiritual places within the Devasthanam premises.
temple_main_desc: The main shrine of Sri Sri Sri Bhunela Sametha Sri Venkateshwara Swamy.
temple_anjaneya_desc: A dedicated temple for Lord Hanuman, symbol of strength and devotion.
temple_shiva_desc: A sacred Shiva temple dedicated to Lord Mahadeva.
temple_goshala_desc: A sacred cow shelter preserving traditional dharmic values.
temple_gundam_desc: A holy temple pond used for ritual cleansing.
temple_navagraha_desc: Shrine dedicated to the nine planetary deities.
temple_dharmashala_desc: Resting place for pilgrims with Hanuman shrine.
temple_shivaji_desc: Statue of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj symbolizing valor and dharma.
temple_kalyanamandapam_desc: Hall used for marriages and auspicious ceremonies.
